Text: RE New LC Req Cc Just wanted to see if these LCs were absolutely necessary at this time We just got another request today for two more LCs The total of all four LCs is now MM and all cash requests are now going through Bill Bradford to see which gets paid Is there any update on your negotiations with Standard Chartered Thanks JR Original Message From Hayslett Rod Sent Monday November PM To Mata Jessie Howard Kevin A Cc Richardson James Subject RE New LC Req What would you like me to do Original Message From Mata Jessie Sent Monday November PM To Howard Kevin A Hayslett Rod Cc Richardson James Subject FW New LC Req James Richardson asked me to forward to you We are not sure Standard Charter can do these We also have around amendment requests from EOTT on date extensions past the drop dead date Please advise Thanks Jessie Original Message From Chen Peter Sent Monday November PM To Maria J NRON Subject New LC Req File New LC Request Matadordoc Peter Chen Credit Specialist EOTT Energy Corp ph fx

RE EOTT LC Cc I did receive the voice mail from Rod stating he personally assures us this obligation will come off at and why it has to expire at January Mary and I talked to Glisan and thought a side letter stating that fact as well as saying Enron could demand payment at if this obligation is not closed out is necessary to correctly document this transaction I have left a voice mail this morning for Rod asking if you guys already have some documentation that would suffice for this matter Any help you can give is greatly appreciated This is going to come up many more times before the end of the year gets here Jessie Mata already has three more EOTT LCs on her desk to be processed once we get more capacity Thanks JR Original Message From Howard Kevin A Sent Friday November PM To Richardson James Subject RE EOTT LC please reference my voice mail from Rod Hayslett Original Message From Richardson James Sent Friday November PM To Howard Kevin A Subject EOTT LC Barry suggested I try to reach you with this question Can we issue a MM LC for EOTT for a crude shipment that expires after They say they need a expiration date I can be reached at x Thanks JR
